Command.CommandString: delete from WMS_Bill where BillID in ({0})
update WMS_Bill set Checker=@Checker,CheckDate=getdate(),State=@State where BillID in ({0})
update WMS_BillMaster set Checker=@Checker,CheckDate=getdate(),State=@State where BillID in ({0})

insert into WMS_Bill(BillID, BillDate, ProductCode, BatchNo, SectionID, PalletQty,BillTypeCode, Memo, Creator, CreateDate, Updater, UpdateDate) values( @BillID,@BillDate,@ProductCode,@BatchNo,@SectionID,@PalletQty,@BillTypeCode,@Memo,@Creator, getdate(), @Updater, getdate())
update WMS_Bill set BillDate=@BillDate, ProductCode=@ProductCode, BatchNo=@BatchNo, SectionID=@SectionID, PalletQty=@PalletQty, Memo=@Memo, Updater=@Updater, UpdateDate=getdate() where BillID=@BillID
Sp_InstockTask
Sp_InStockCancelTask
SP_GetInStockProductQty
select * from VCMD_ProductInStock where {0}

insert into WMS_Bill(BillID, BillDate, ProductCode, BatchNo, SectionID, BillTypeCode, Creator, CreateDate, Updater, UpdateDate) values( @BillID,@BillDate,@ProductCode,@BatchNo,@SectionID,@BillTypeCode,@Creator, getdate(), @Updater, getdate())
update cmd_cell set isLock=1 where PalletBarCode=@ProductCode and BatchNo=@BatchNo and SectionID=@RowID
Sp_DeleteOutStock
Sp_OutStockTask
Sp_OutStockTask2
Sp_OutstockCancelTask
Sp_OutstockCancelTask2

update WMS_BillMaster set BillDate=@BillDate, BillTypeCode=@BillTypeCode ,ProductCode=@ProductCode, BatchNo=@BatchNo,SectionID=@SectionID,Qty=@Qty,PalletQty=@PalletQty,Memo=@Memo, Updater=@Updater, UpdateDate=getdate() where BillID=@BillID

insert into WMS_BillMaster(BillID, BillDate, ProductCode, BatchNo, SectionID, BillTypeCode,PalletQty,Qty, Creator, CreateDate, Updater, UpdateDate) values( @BillID,@BillDate,@ProductCode,@BatchNo,@SectionID,@BillTypeCode,@PalletQty,@Qty,@Creator, getdate(), @Updater, getdate())
INSERT INTO WMS_BillDetail(BillID,RowID,ProductCode,Quantity,CellCode)VALUES(@BillID,@RowID,@ProductCode,@Quantity,@CellCode)
delete from WMS_BillMaster where BillId in ({0})
delete from WMS_BillDetail where BillId in ({0})

select Cell.*, ProductCategory.CategoryName,product.ProductCode,product.CategoryCode,productdetail.SectionName,product.ProductName,1 as PalletQty from CMD_Cell cell left join CMD_ProductDetail productdetail on cell.PalletBarCode=productdetail.ProductCode and cell.SectionID=productdetail.RowID left join CMD_Product product on product.ProductCode=productdetail.ProductCode left join CMD_ProductCategory ProductCategory on product.CategoryCode=ProductCategory.CategoryCode where InDate is not null and {0}

select product.CategoryCode, ProductCategory.CategoryName,product.ProductCode,product.ProductName,cell.SectionID,productdetail.SectionName,cell.BatchNo,COUNT(1) as PalletQty,SUM(cell.Qty) as Qty from CMD_Cell cell left join CMD_ProductDetail productdetail on cell.PalletBarCode=productdetail.ProductCode and cell.SectionID=productdetail.RowID left join CMD_Product product on product.ProductCode=productdetail.ProductCode left join CMD_ProductCategory ProductCategory on product.CategoryCode=ProductCategory.CategoryCode where InDate is not null and {0} group by product.CategoryCode, ProductCategory.CategoryName,product.ProductCode,product.ProductName,cell.SectionID,productdetail.SectionName,cell.BatchNo

SELECT Task.*,BillType.BillTypeName,Product.ProductName,Product.ProductCode,Product.ProductNo,Product.CategoryName,Product.Unit,TableState.StateDesc,crane.CraneName,detail.BillID,detail.Quantity, (case when Task.TaskType='11' then TASK.StationNo when Task.TaskType in('12','13','14') then Task.CellCode end) FromStation,convert(nvarchar,task.StartDate,120) as SStartDate,convert(nvarchar,task.FinishDate,120) as SFinishDate, (case when Task.TaskType in ('11','14') then Task.CellCode when Task.TaskType='12' then TASK.StationNo when Task.TaskType='13' then Task.ToCellCode end) ToStation FROM WCS_TASK Task left join WCS_TaskProductDetail detail on Task.TaskNo=detail.TaskNo left join VCMD_Product product on detail.ProductCode=Product.ProductCode left join CMD_Crane Crane on Task.CraneNo=crane.CraneNo left join CMD_BillType BillType on task.BillTypeCode=billtype.BillTypeCode left join Sys_TableState TableState on TableState.TableName='WCS_TASK' and TableState.FieldName='State' and Task.State=TableState.State where {0}

select task.PalletCode,CellCode,task.FinishDate,Detail.ProductCode,Detail.Barcode,detail.Quantity,Product.CategoryName,Product.ProductNo, product.ProductName,product.Spec,product.Unit,product.ValidPeriod,product.Description,product.Memo as M,product.PartNo,main.SourceBillNo,detail.BillID,convert(nvarchar,task.FinishDate,120) as SFinishDate from WCS_TASK Task left join WCS_TaskProductDetail Detail on Task.TaskNo=Detail.TaskNo left join VCMD_Product Product on Detail.ProductCode=Product.ProductCode left join WMS_BillMaster Main on Detail.BillID=main.BillID where task.TaskType='12' and task.State=7 and {0}

SELECT WCS_TASK.*,c1.CellName,CMD_BillType.BillTypeName,product.ProductName,SectionName,Region.RegionName,Sys_TableState.StateDesc,c1.CellRow,c1.CellColumn,S1.ShelfValue FROM WCS_TASK left join CMD_Cell C1 on WCS_TASK.CellCode=C1.CellCode left join CMD_Shelf S1 On C1.ShelfCode=S1.ShelfCode left join CMD_BillType On CMD_BillType.BillTypeCode=WCS_TASK.BillTypeCode LEFT JOIN Sys_TableState on Sys_TableState.TableName='WCS_TASK' and Sys_TableState.FieldName='State' and WCS_TASK.State=Sys_TableState.State left join CMD_ProductDetail detail on wcs_task.PalletCode=detail.ProductCode and wcs_task.SectionID=detail.RowID left join CMD_Product product on detail.ProductCode=product.ProductCode left join CMD_Region Region on wcs_task.RegionCode=region.RegionCode where {0} ORDER BY WCS_TASK.TaskNo desc
